Tunable.name: AGING_STATISTIC
Tunable.description: The statistic we are operating on.

TunableList.name: AUTO_ASSIGN_NEW_INHABITANTS
TunableList.description: On a schedule, automatically assigns new animals to existing homes that have vacancy. The assignment will try to assign existing homeless animals before creating new animals.

TunableEnum.name: animal_type
TunableEnum.description: The animal home type to scan for on the existing lot.

TunableTuple.name: max_homes_to_assign
TunableTuple.description: When auto-assignment triggers, this is the maximum number of homes to randomly pick. Homes at max capacity are excluded. The value is a random number between the lower and upper bounds, inclusively. For example: The value is randomly 3. 15 homes are on the lot (10 empty or partially full, 5 full) From the 10 homes, 3 are randomly picked for auto-assignment.

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

TunableTuple.name: num_assignments_per_home
TunableTuple.description: The number of auto-assignments per home. The value is a random number between the lower and upper bounds, inclusively.

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

TdescFragTag.name: tests
TdescFragTag.description: Conditional tests to determine if auto-assignment occurs.

TunableTuple.name: weekly_schedule
TunableTuple.description: Determines when to trigger the auto-assignment.

TunableList.name: schedule_entries
TunableList.description: A list of event schedules. Each event is a mapping of days of the week to a start_time and duration.

TunableTuple.description: A schedule. Define availability for days of the week. For the set of specified days, define an hour of the day and a duration, in hours. Optionally, specified if the start time is random within the tuned window.

TunableTuple.name: days_available
TunableTuple.description: Which days of the week to include

Tunable.name: duration
Tunable.description: Duration of this work session in hours.

TunableVariant.name: multi_day_career_days_at_work

TunableVariant.description: This tunable should only be used with multi-day rabbitholes. If you are not sure about whether this should be used for the career you are tuning, please check with your GPE partner. Set the days the Sim should be at their multi-day career here. Used for setting values in UI.

TunableTuple.name: enabled
TunableTuple.description: Which days of the week to include

TunableVariant.name: multi_day_career_start_and_end_days
TunableVariant.display: Multi Day Career Start And End Days
TunableVariant.description: This tunable should only be used with multi-day rabbitholes. If you are not sure about whether this should be used for the career you are tuning, please check with your GPE partner. Used to tell the UI which days the multi-day career starts and ends on.

TunableEnum.name: end_day
TunableEnum.description: The day the multi-day career ends.

TunableEnum.name: start_day
TunableEnum.description: The day the multi-day career starts.

Tunable.name: random_start
Tunable.description: If checked, this schedule will have a random start time in the tuned window each time.

TunableEnum.name: schedule_shift_type
TunableEnum.description: Shift Type for the schedule, this will be used for validations.

TunableTuple.name: start_time
TunableTuple.description: An Hour(24Hr) and Minute representing a time relative to the beginning of a day.

TunableList.name: GARDENING_HELP_ANIMAL_STATES
TunableList.description: For animals with gardening help enabled, these are the states that an animal will transition from/to whenever the plant's state changes. The order of these lists is the preference in the animal to pick.

Tunable.name: GARDENING_HELP_STATE
Tunable.description: The gardening help state that animals have when gardening help is enabled.

TunableList.name: GARDENING_HELP_WEED_STATES
TunableList.description: For animals with gardening help enabled, these are the relevant weed states on plants to watch for.

TunableTuple.name: MAX_EMPTY_HOMES_TO_POPULATE
TunableTuple.description: Some Animal Home Component objects are configured to populate empty homes for the following conditions. These settings configure the maximum number of empty homes that can be populated at one time.

Tunable.name: on_new_homes
Tunable.description: The limit on number of new homes to populate if placed during Build/Buy.

Tunable.name: on_zone_load
Tunable.description: The limit on number of empty homes to populate after zone load.
